channel.title: CVE Feed for Gerbv -- gerbv

item.title: CVE-2023-4508|2024-01-30T23:35:01.605Z -- gerbv -- gerbv
item.description: A user able to control file input to Gerbv, between versions 2.4.0 and 2.10.0, can cause a crash and cause denial-of-service with a specially crafted Gerber RS-274X file.
